review_text: The pasta was perfectly cooked and the sauce was incredible. However, we waited nearly 40 minutes for our appetizers.
Battery life is amazing, easily lasts two days. The camera quality in low light could be better though.
Our waiter was attentive and gave great wine recommendations. The ambiance was romantic and cozy.
Packaging was damaged when it arrived. The product itself works fine but first impressions matter.
Food was cold when it arrived at our table. Manager comped our meal and apologized profusely.
Best purchase I've made this year! Intuitive interface and does exactly what I need.
Portions are huge, great value for money. The decor is a bit dated but who cares when the food is this good.
Instructions were confusing and missing steps. Had to watch YouTube videos to figure out assembly.
Reservation system is a nightmare, tried calling for three days. Once we got in, the food was just okay.
Works as advertised but feels cheap. Not sure it will last more than a year.
The chef came out to ask about allergies personally. Best gluten-free pasta I've ever had!
Customer service was helpful when I had questions. Shipping was fast, arrived in two days.
Too loud, couldn't have a conversation. Menu has great variety though.
Stopped working after three weeks. Warranty process was smooth and they sent a replacement quickly.
Hidden fees on the bill for things that should be included. Food was fine but felt nickel-and-dimed.
Exactly as described in photos. Color is vibrant and material quality exceeds expectations.
They remembered it was my birthday without me mentioning it. Complimentary dessert was a nice touch.
App keeps crashing on my phone. The hardware is great but software needs serious work.
Vegan options are limited and seemed like an afterthought. Server wasn't knowledgeable about ingredients.
Good value for the price point. Not premium quality but does the job for everyday use.
